channel.title: New-Era 718/752
channel.description:
[center][size=6][color=orange][font=Arial][B][U]Welcome to New-Era 718[/U][/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE] [SIZE=4][color=green]We are happy to announce the launch of New-Era, we are offering so much! A great community, a server that every single skill works including construction. Players can create their own house, build a wide verity of cool stuff in their house. Livid farming fast easy farming, also have the traditional farming for those of you that do fancy the livid farming, Livid mining, and so much more. Another thing that is amazing about New-Era the kind, caring and productive staff. The staff seems to always be working to Improve the server. The staff's devotion, and the ability to listen to what the players want implemented into the server is what makes this server truly the best.[/COLOR] [/SIZE]
Website [url=http://www.new-era.pw/]New-Era - Best RSPS July 2015[/url]
[SIZE=5][color=red]A little about New-Era[/COLOR][/SIZE] [SIZE=2][color=green] [color=green] -Version: 718/752 -Exp Rate (Regular) : 90x -Vps Hosted 24/7[/COLOR]
[color=red]Some of New-Era's features [/COLOR] [color=green] - Castle Wars, Clan Wars pking, Edgville Pking - On-Spot Duel Everywhere - Minigames - 25/25 Skills Trainable - Vorago, Leeuni Bosses - Unlimited Prestige System - Boss Contractor - RealRs Dungeoneering with multiple floors - Team Dungeoneering - Team Slayer - Daily Task System - Buff System - Auto Donations (100% fully working) - Player Owned Shops - Player Owned Houses - Multiple Exp modes Novice(Easy) Normal (normal (90x) No-life (Hard) - Amazing donator benefits - No-life Zone ;;NLZ - Working Clans - Much More
-----UPDATES----- - Full chaos tunnels added with npcs (accessed from Edgville wildy) - spirit shield of hope is added to corp drop table ( has divine effect) - Adjusted stats of main and off-hand hand drygores - Added off-hand drygores to merc mage - Added Staff team section on forums - Monkfish are now able to be caught along with the sharks/swordfish. - Added stats to Scarlet spirit shield - Added divine affect to scarlet spirit shield - Corp now drops Scarlet Spirit shield - Added Death touched darts effect - Fixed rules and Regulations link - Added stats to off-hand dragon crossbow, longsword, battle axe, Scimmy and Mace. - Added Off-hand dragon weapons to Kalphite Queen - Added a Challenges Section on forums, so players can assign difficult tasks for others players to accomplish. - charms are now fixed from droping more than one type. - buff points can now be earned from undead cows randomly every kills. - buff points can also be earned randomly from skilling. - nerfed the dragon armours dropped from undead cow. - you gain 2k buff points from voting. - new buff feature to be added called skilling package for 50k points. - skilling package: thieving without damage done. - skilling package: cooking without burnt done. - change the fire @ home so you can "add logs on the fire". - the ;;titlecolor and ;;titleshad are now fixed to only 50+ donation total - removed the "equipment view stat" button @ bank to avoid glitching - removed the "?" button @ bank also - skilling package buff: continuous firemaking, done. - skilling package buff now added for 30k buff points! - run energy now decreases - vorago kinda nerfed - highscores max combat level now turns back to 138(99 max level) instead of 169(120 max level) - added your ranks on the highscores - added your modes on the highscores - added highscores for novice mode - added highscores for regular mode - added highscores for no-life mode - changed the wordings on server automated refresher - added auto save highscores on server automated refresher - added auto save accounts on server automated refresher - fixed so when you do ;;hs your browser will lead to where your mode is(after server restart). - Scimitar Stall now gives more xp - Runecrafting is Added back - Livid Farm is added back - Fixed spelling - Adjusted crafting material prices - ;;titlecolor and ;;titleshad added for sponsors - changed teleport animations - removed some greeting text on player startup - donator cape fixed from not able to wear with less than 99 attack - boss contract fixed(kills was not counted) - master capes fixed so you need 200m exp to wear - Spirit Shield of Hope has divine effect Added- Nerfed Tzharr whip 7 - Nerfed Clay weapons - Buffed avatar of Destruction - Added Stats to Spirit of hope shield - Woodcutting spot moved to Seer's Village - Nerfed Rock Crabs ( no more getting 1 hit) :) - Clay/Runite is added back @ the teleport - Added runite ore back into ;;dz - Added ;;nlz zone (Only No-Life users can go to) - Added Ores, magic trees, willow trees, fishing spots and furnace to ;;nlz - Fishing, mining and woodcutting in ;;nlz have a chance to let you catch double. So you may cut 2 logs at a time or catch 2 fish at a time. - Added Tin,iron and copper ore to Second mining spot - Added a bank to both mining spots - Adjusted a few trivia questions - Rules and Regulations is now linked correctly in-game - Balanced the stats of decimation, obliteration and boogie Bow - Balanced Primal Drop rates - Added a boss drop list button in quest Tab - Our Youtube promo video will be done shortly. here is a sample dded a portal to the barrows chest so you can use it to tele back to barrows, no need to go home - you can now only receive the bonus spins for maxing all stats ONCE. - added slayer gem @ slayer shop for 1 slayer points(used to invite for slayer team) - BUFF system are now ingame - to gaining buff points are to be discussed - ;;rules fixed - ;;topic (topic number) fixed - ;;updates fixed - ;;drops fixed - no life title colours fixed - fixed mode changer to remove titles of no-life mode[/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[B][color=red][SIZE=5]On the Spot Dueling[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4866333/On_the_spot_dueling.PNG[/img]
[B][SIZE=5][color=red]Construction[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4866339/House_one.PNG[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4866342/house_2.PNG[/img]
[SIZE=5][color=red]Buff Points Reward Shop [/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4866344/Buff_points.PNG[/img]
[SIZE=5][color=red]Game Modes [/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4866345/exp.PNG[/img]
[SIZE=5][color=red]200m xp Capes [/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4866357/200m_XPcapes.PNG[/img]
[SIZE=5][color=red]Tream Dungeoneering[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4866397/team_dung.PNG[/img]
Website [url=http://www.new-era.pw/]New-Era - Best RSPS July 2015[/url]

Website [url=http://www.new-era.pw/]New-Era - Best RSPS July 2015[/url] [/center]

item.title: New-Era 718/752
item.dc:creator: @Iron_Displee Iron Displee
item.description:
@Iron_Displee wrote:

The server of New-Era 718/752 is a unique RSPS which has much content an on-spot dueling which is always a advantage, the server has been done so it isn’t pay2win an you have to grind your way up the ranks of being the strongest. The xp rates range from easy to challenging. I recommend this server for what it has accomplished so far an it’s current staff being the best of the best, this server may have a long way to go but I guarantee it will come out to be in the top.

Sincerely, Iron Displee.

Read full topic

item.title: New-Era 718/752
item.dc:creator: @Mattattack88 Mattattack88
item.description:
@Mattattack88 wrote:

Although New-Era may look like your typical/standard 718, it really isn’t. The server is only just over a month old, but has many unique features to it and more are being added very quickly. New-Era’s player-base is rapidly increasing due to the enjoyment that is given off by the features of the sever. Not only is the server unique, but the community is very friendly in many ways and if you need to know anything, answers will be give instantly. Not only is the community very unique and friendly, but the staff are very friendly active as well. The server is updated often and you will find yourself doing new things often so you will constantly be occupied.

Read full topic

item.title: New-Era 718/752
item.dc:creator: @TrippyHippy TrippyHippy
item.description:
@TrippyHippy wrote:


Donator Zone - Absinthe

Pretty new to the server, but in a grind my first impressions were; well designed, fluent, thoroughly planned, active staff and development. The community showed it was consistent, nurturing, competitive and encouraging. The content is rich and immerses you in challenging environment, fair rates, intriguing complexity, and addicting rewards. With a growing player base and increasing constructive feedback New-Era is packed with potential and I’m glad I joined the journey.

Read full topic

item.title: New-Era 718/752
item.dc:creator: @bestthebeast bestthebeast
item.description:
@bestthebeast wrote:

I have been playing this server for about 1 month and a bit now and I must say the community is very friendly and the staff are great at what they do. I see the owner a few times and the developer a bit more so they are around. I think everyone should join even if its to test the server

Read full topic

item.title: New-Era 718/752
item.dc:creator: @slayer2014 slayer2014
item.description:
@slayer2014 wrote:

This server is awesome you will not find a better one, the devotion of the owner and developer their are updates constantly, implementing player suggestions fixing bug that are found. and just making the server a better place for players. The staff of new era is kind helpful and very warm welcoming, you will never find a server that treats you the way new era will.

The community

The community is so lovable it is like one big family of people players helping each other out all the players are just so very awesome you will enjoy new-era if you join

thanks for reading
blink

Read full topic

item.title: New-Era 718/752
item.dc:creator: @Sulle Sulle
item.description:
@Sulle wrote:

I’ve played New-Era from the start and I’ll keep playing until the end of time. This server has everything you could ever imagine, you won’t ever be done! There is so much stuff to do. The community is so nice and friendly, the staff team is great and listens to the community! All in all an amazing server!

item.title: New-Era 718/752
item.dc:creator: @waaz waaz
item.description:
@waaz wrote:

[center][size=6][color=orange][font=Arial]Welcome to New-Era 718[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][color=green]We are happy to announce the launch of New-Era, we are offering so much! A great community, a server that every single skill works including construction. Players can create their own house, build a wide verity of cool stuff in their house. Livid farming fast easy farming, also have the traditional farming for those of you that do fancy the livid farming, Livid mining, and so much more. Another thing that is amazing about New-Era the kind, caring and productive staff. The staff seems to always be working to Improve the server. The staff’s devotion, and the ability to listen to what the players want implemented into the server is what makes this server truly the best.[/COLOR] [/SIZE]

Website New-Era - Best RSPS July 2015

[SIZE=5][color=red]A little about New-Era[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=2][color=green]
[color=green]
-Version: 718/752
-Exp Rate (Regular) : 90x
-Vps Hosted 24/7[/COLOR]

[color=red]Some of New-Era’s features [/COLOR]
[color=green]

  • Castle Wars, Clan Wars pking, Edgville Pking
  • On-Spot Duel Everywhere
  • Minigames
  • 25/25 Skills Trainable
  • Vorago, Leeuni Bosses
  • Unlimited Prestige System
  • Boss Contractor
  • RealRs Dungeoneering with multiple floors
  • Team Dungeoneering
  • Team Slayer
  • Daily Task System
  • Buff System
  • Auto Donations (100% fully working)
  • Player Owned Shops
  • Player Owned Houses
  • Multiple Exp modes Novice(Easy) Normal (normal (90x) No-life (Hard)
  • Amazing donator benefits
  • No-life Zone ;;NLZ
  • Working Clans
  • Much More

-----UPDATES-----

  • Full chaos tunnels added with npcs (accessed from Edgville wildy)
  • spirit shield of hope is added to corp drop table ( has divine effect)
  • Adjusted stats of main and off-hand hand drygores
  • Added off-hand drygores to merc mage
  • Added Staff team section on forums
  • Monkfish are now able to be caught along with the sharks/swordfish.
  • Added stats to Scarlet spirit shield
  • Added divine affect to scarlet spirit shield
  • Corp now drops Scarlet Spirit shield
  • Added Death touched darts effect
  • Fixed rules and Regulations link
  • Added stats to off-hand dragon crossbow, longsword, battle axe, Scimmy and Mace.
  • Added Off-hand dragon weapons to Kalphite Queen
  • Added a Challenges Section on forums, so players can assign difficult tasks for others players to accomplish.
  • charms are now fixed from droping more than one type.
  • buff points can now be earned from undead cows randomly every kills.
  • buff points can also be earned randomly from skilling.
  • nerfed the dragon armours dropped from undead cow.
  • you gain 2k buff points from voting.
  • new buff feature to be added called skilling package for 50k points.
  • skilling package: thieving without damage done.
  • skilling package: cooking without burnt done.
  • change the fire @ home so you can “add logs on the fire”.
  • the ;;titlecolor and ;;titleshad are now fixed to only 50+ donation total
  • removed the “equipment view stat” button @ bank to avoid glitching
  • removed the “?” button @ bank also
  • skilling package buff: continuous firemaking, done.
  • skilling package buff now added for 30k buff points!
  • run energy now decreases
  • vorago kinda nerfed
  • highscores max combat level now turns back to 138(99 max level) instead of 169(120 max level)
  • added your ranks on the highscores
  • added your modes on the highscores
  • added highscores for novice mode
  • added highscores for regular mode
  • added highscores for no-life mode
  • changed the wordings on server automated refresher
  • added auto save highscores on server automated refresher
  • added auto save accounts on server automated refresher
  • fixed so when you do ;;hs your browser will lead to where your mode is(after server restart).
  • Scimitar Stall now gives more xp
  • Runecrafting is Added back
  • Livid Farm is added back
  • Fixed spelling
  • Adjusted crafting material prices
  • ;;titlecolor and ;;titleshad added for sponsors
  • changed teleport animations
  • removed some greeting text on player startup
  • donator cape fixed from not able to wear with less than 99 attack
  • boss contract fixed(kills was not counted)
  • master capes fixed so you need 200m exp to wear
  • Spirit Shield of Hope has divine effect Added- Nerfed Tzharr whip 7
  • Nerfed Clay weapons
  • Buffed avatar of Destruction
  • Added Stats to Spirit of hope shield
  • Woodcutting spot moved to Seer’s Village
  • Nerfed Rock Crabs ( no more getting 1 hit)
  • Clay/Runite is added back @ the teleport
  • Added runite ore back into ;;dz
  • Added ;;nlz zone (Only No-Life users can go to)
  • Added Ores, magic trees, willow trees, fishing spots and furnace to ;;nlz
  • Fishing, mining and woodcutting in ;;nlz have a chance to let you catch double. So you may cut 2 logs at a time or catch 2 fish at a time.
  • Added Tin,iron and copper ore to Second mining spot
  • Added a bank to both mining spots
  • Adjusted a few trivia questions
  • Rules and Regulations is now linked correctly in-game
  • Balanced the stats of decimation, obliteration and boogie Bow
  • Balanced Primal Drop rates
  • Added a boss drop list button in quest Tab
  • Our Youtube promo video will be done shortly. here is a sample dded a portal to the barrows chest so you can use it to tele back to barrows, no need to go home
  • you can now only receive the bonus spins for maxing all stats ONCE.
  • added slayer gem @ slayer shop for 1 slayer points(used to invite for slayer team)
  • BUFF system are now ingame
  • to gaining buff points are to be discussed
  • ;;rules fixed
  • ;;topic (topic number) fixed
  • ;;updates fixed
  • ;;drops fixed
  • no life title colours fixed
  • fixed mode changer to remove titles of no-life mode[/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]
